website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive shoe noted for its great fit and arch support.
pros: Offers superior fit, particularly for wide feet
Great arch support in a durable, lightweight shoe
cons: Many buyers feel that the sizing runs a little large for this option

customer_reviews.title: Euro sizes? Had to buy the next size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, I wear a 10 in pretty much everything. I had to buy a 9-9.5 and they fit perfectly. Having said that, these are hands down the MOST comfortable shoes I've ever owned right out if the box. Walked 18 and they were completely broken in by the 2nd hole. Feet were completely dry. Super light too. Let's be honest, I bought these shoes because they looked great. I was not disappointed IRL.
customer_reviews.author: PENNAME

customer_reviews.title: Best footwear for the money PERiOD
customer_reviews.text: I don't believe I've ever have a better fitting pair of golf shoes. It's like gloves for your feet. I purchased these after buying a pair of Ecco hiking boots which are even more comfortable than the whole shoes. My left ankle has been crushed with three previous surgeries in my right ankle was broken with a surgery so needless to say I have a lot of aches and pains in my feet and ankles. This brand of footwear is by far the best I've found on the market after years of searching for something comfortable that would put the lease amount of strain on my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Mrblaster

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe so far!!!
customer_reviews.text: wow.....these are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn (they feel like moccasins!).....also, the most expensive!! So.....do I think they are worth the extra money? Yes.........I don't need distractions on the golf course from shoes...there's enough to complain about in golf already!!! I just hope they are durable and last a long time.....my foot joys lasted a couple seasons....my callaways wore out quicker so I'm hoping to get two seasons from these.
customer_reviews.author: Henry T

customer_reviews.title: They are the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I already own 3 pairs of Ecco Biom Hybrid golf shoes. They are the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn. So it was a no brainer when I saw this pair at a great price. I'm almost up to one tenth of the number of shoes that my wife owns.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Chu

customer_reviews.title: 8 1/2 a bit large
customer_reviews.text: These quality built golf shoe are expensive and normally more than I would pay for a golf shoe.The shoes sizing is a bit larger than normal, but wearing a thicker sock has helped the “louse, bit sloppy feel”. I have worn these shoes for multiple walking rounds of golf and they are very comfortable and so far appear to be built with quality materials. If I come across a reduced price I would definitely buy a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Russell

customer_reviews.title: First class 'seats' for your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome as always. ECCO are by far the best and lightest, comfortable playing shoes. Tired of having to replace worn-out or lost cleats, so I am permanent convert to spikeless also. Only complaint on these are that the YAK leather is too soft to handle a scuff without tearing. I tore mine by simply rubbing my other shoe accidentally over the top while walking but I would still buy ECCO over other brands first.
customer_reviews.author: Just Sayin

customer_reviews.title: One word...EXCELLENT (on all counts)
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for this brand but sooooo worth it. Hubby has very flat and wide feet and he LOVES these shoes. Perfect fit right out of the box which rarely happens for him. These are EXCELLENT golf shoes. If you are a golfer, you should definitely buy yourself a GOOD shoe and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You'll be surprised how comfortable these are
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair. I absolutely love them. Pros: They are comfortable and durable. Sizing is accurate. Packaging is authentic and came in a protective shipping box. These shoes have great arch support and the tread is great. Cons: Yak leather isn't easy to clean so I got a darker color this time around. The "white" portion of the shoe is also a bit grey and not truly white but it isn't a factor for me. I walked quite a bit in Germany and Czech Republic with my previous pair. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Luna

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and don't collect mud
customer_reviews.text: My best golf shoes ever. Really comfortable and the studs work well and they don't pick up hardly any mud or turf or goose poop. When I go to clean them off at the end of the round there's not much to blow out of the treads. Strangely enough I tried some Ecco athletic shoes and they were not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to go wrong with Ecco
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe because the reviews said it was comfortable. Also, my past experience with Ecco shoes has been excellent. I have always got my money's worth out of all my past Ecco shoes. If in doubt, try it.
customer_reviews.author: Don Estreich

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: I was aware of the reputation of ECCO golf shoe for over all comfort and being well constructed. The shoe is as advertised! Most comfortable yet supportive golf shoe I have owned. Excellent walking shoe, very well made, would highly recommend. This was also the best price I have seen, I have been shopping for this shoe. My advice, use your European size when ordering the shoe, not the US size equivalent. I had to return the shoes, no hassle return. I have the correct size now. 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Koczajowski

customer_reviews.title: The Best...
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what anybody says. I have been playing this game since I was 9. I have tried every Golf shoe out there.... There is no Better Golf shoe than ECCO. They are the Best....Period.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Logan

customer_reviews.title: ECCO shoes are great.
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes. I have used my first pair for over 6 years. They are still good enough for casual wear. These shoes are comfortable and well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Mcconnell

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes in golf!!
customer_reviews.text: Ecco are the most comfortable shoes in my opinion hands down and I have worn them all! Also, these spikeless bottoms grip the ground very well even with my high swing speed and they last a lot longer than I expected! I would even wear them to get lunch at a local restaurant or store after my rounds all while walking on pavement. I have another pair that are 2 years old and still have plenty of “grip” left on them. Great product and I would highly recommend them and do to everyone I play with!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Waters

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting golf shoes on the planet. All my dress and sport shoes are Eccos. They last a long time and feel great, and are very, very stylish
customer_reviews.author: musicstarrman

customer_reviews.title: Best Spikeless shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are undoubtedly, the most comfortable golf shoes I’ve ever worn. They are not inexpensive, but they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Ecco golf shoes are the best
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They're comfortable and, to me, look good. And the "nubby" spikes mean I can wear them on the course, in the club house, when driving my car, and everywhere else if I want. I already knew what size I needed from a previous pair so the fit was as expected, perfect. Now if only they could help lower my handicap.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Bob

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9 in Nike, ordered a size 42 (8-8.5) in these Ecco, fit is still about a 1/2 size too big but afraid to go any smaller. These are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever own, with a thick pair of socks, they fit just fine. I plan on ordering another pair in a different color. They are a bit pricey but well worth the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought them, finally!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the most comfortable golf shoe I have ever tried on. Played the first round and still comfortable. Should last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: nicholaus a bryant

customer_reviews.title: Little early to tell
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good looking and very well made. Too early to tell if I'll buy a back-up pair because I like them so much. Few more rounds will let me know.
customer_reviews.author: Cigarnanraf

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They're my 3rd pair of Bioms. I wear a sz. 12 W and the size 46 fits me like a glove. At the beginning of the day when I first put them on they feel snug all around. But the supple yak leather quickly expands so that they really do feel like a glove after a hole or two. I buy a pair every year. If you watch these shoes they often go on sale, I've never paid over $100 for them but I wouldn't feel cheated paying full price. Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Weird Al Quada

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great fit comfortable on the or and agood looking shoe also
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerdanny

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Ecco Biom Hybrids. I find them the best golf show I have ever worn, and I have worn a few different brands and models. I would not buy another type of golf shoe. Period.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ridge View

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes. Fits my orthotics. Very comfortable to walk in
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: The only golf shoes that fits me perfectly and are ...
customer_reviews.text: The only golf shoes that fits me perfectly and are water repellent for a long time. Design and quality are superb.
customer_reviews.author: Bricks Bondoc

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe for golf.
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 4th pair of these shoes. Truest the best and most comfortable golf show for one who walks the course. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Zo75

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable from the first wearing
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these golf shoes. They are comfortable from the first wearing. The uppers wear well, but the cleats wear out with time and heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: John I. Fishburne

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I have a little wider foot. Normal width is too tight and wide are a little loose. I have tried dozens of shoes and brands. I always come back to Ecco. They are not as padded as the Adidas eco boost or sketchers but are very comfortable. I walked 18 holes out of the box with no blisters or tired feet.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoe on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of Ecco golf shoes. I play150 rounds per year and I would not wear any other golf shoe. For sure a 5 star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Beachum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes, of any kind, I have ever worn. I wear them all the time, not just golfing.
customer_reviews.author: Will B.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Have not worn these shoes yet but I own several pair of Ecco golf shoes and they're the most comfortable I have owned. Like the style of this pair and was not disappointed upon seeing them after receiving.
customer_reviews.author: James H Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Ecco's and I love them. Good arch support and they hold up. I'm a woman and need the men's sizes because they don't make my size in women's.
customer_reviews.author: triple K

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe — a tad tight on the width + wish it was a bit more “breathable”... but all in all, good support + fairly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: kwg

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12 - 12.5 and my right foot is swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Other than that the shoe is very comfortable and wears well
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy men's shoes because my foot is so wide. The heel does not fit so I have to add support. Other than that the shoe is very comfortable and wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Brockland

customer_reviews.title: Another pair of my favorite golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and subtle good looks. They are a bit expensive, but worth it. They have a wide toe box. These run a little large for me, but a smaller size might not work.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: ECCO makes a great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, excellent comfort. With ECCO, the sizing is always consistent. Once you know your number, any shoe in that size will fit the same - at least that has been my experience. These shoes are a great golf shoe and also can be worn anywhere because of the sole.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Pat

customer_reviews.title: ... play quite a bit of golf so having a comfortable yet durable shoe made somewhere other than China was ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this shoe- we play quite a bit of golf so having a comfortable yet durable shoe made somewhere other than China was important to us.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Evans

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the comfort and look of these golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 12 so I ordered the12/12.5 Ecco golf shoe. First time ordering a shoe with this size option. I'm going to order 11/11.5 to see how they fit. Very pleased with the comfort and look of these golf shoes. Hopefully I get into the right size.
customer_reviews.author: T-Cap

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes - they are the 2nd pair of ECCOs that I have purchased. Most comfortable golf shoes I have worn
customer_reviews.author: Kurt P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best Golf Shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I love ECCO golf shoes - they are all that I wear and this is the best pair yet. They fit great, are comfortable and very stable for golf. I would buy them again in a minute !! Pete L
customer_reviews.author: Pete Leveille

customer_reviews.title: soft and comfortable. Will not hesitate to buy another one next ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light, soft and comfortable. Will not hesitate to buy another one next time I need golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: atros4

customer_reviews.title: He has Diabetes Milletus II and said these shoes work great for him
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He has Diabetes Milletus II and said these shoes work great for him. So comfy he wore them to drive home!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylin with his Ecco's
customer_reviews.text: My hubby loves his Ecco golf shoes. Only brand he wears now. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Memaw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: They are the best shoes, feet feel great after a round of golf!!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Order one size less
customer_reviews.text: The shoe meets and exceeds all expectations. I would suggest ordering one size less than what you think you need.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: By far the most comfortable, best fitting shoes I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are now my 5th pair of Ecco golf shoes. I also own three pairs of Ecco street shoes too. By far the most comfortable, best fitting shoes I have ever worn. This particular Ecco shoe is no exception. Very highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had ECCO golf shoes before. I like the quality and the comfortable wear. Unfortunately after one season they need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaiserswerth

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these golf shoes and owns two pairs. They fit well and are very comfortable. He highly recommends them.
customer_reviews.author: Chip and Jill Maronde

customer_reviews.title: ECCO golf shoes are very comfortable. No break-in
customer_reviews.text: ECCO golf shoes are very comfortable. No break-in. I can typically get about 50 rounds from a pair before bottom sole begins to wear too much.
customer_reviews.author: hgg

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoes I've had. These shoes have a nice look that an athlete can appreciate. They look better than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide senior feet
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Eccos bought within the past two months. Most comfortable golf shoes I've ever purchased and its not even close. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the break in period
customer_reviews.text: Agree with others that these are a little stiff right out of the box but after one wearing they break in. I've played a few times since getting them and they are very comfortable. Almost wore them home once they felt so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AJY

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd pairs of Ecco golf shoes, ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pairs of Ecco golf shoes, Last a few years and fit perfectly. Used it for after golf walking shoes. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit perect right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous golf shoes 2nd pair, right out of the box they feel perfect
customer_reviews.author: i1der2

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. For my money, ECCO makes the best golf shoes. Comfortable and quality materials. I have a few pairs.Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Arturio H.

customer_reviews.title: CCO Men's Biom Hybrid Hydromax Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Ecco's. I have triple E feet and seem to be wider than that. Very Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pops_Silva_Fox

customer_reviews.title: It's just a great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of ECCO's golf shoes in 6 months, I wanted different colors and they all fit very well. I'm done for a while. It's just a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really like my new Ecco golf shoes. Very comfortable and light. Still have an older pair which I will use for rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe for both on and off the course
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable golf shoe, recommend you try the shoe at your local golf store to confirm size first as these were just slightly larger than expected. These shoes are so comfortable I've even started wearing them outside the golf course!
customer_reviews.author: R Adams

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly comfortable and one of the finest golf shoes I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It would be nice if they were slightly wider, there didn't seem to be a wider size selection.
customer_reviews.author: Shoty RCP

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable. The style looked a little better to me ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. The style looked a little better to me in the picture. They don't seem stylish, but they are for golf, so I don't really care.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. He's looking forward to using them
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. Nice shoes. He's looking forward to using them.
customer_reviews.author: Southern style

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, good looks. Looks like the tops will last forever — and then you can get them resolved (albeit with a stock Vibram sole). They’will certainly outlast me.

customer_reviews.title: Value and quality with these Gild shoes.
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes fit great and last for years. I had a previous pair for 6 years.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Have just worn them once
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Have just worn them once, but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and my feet stayed dry
customer_reviews.text: Walked 18 holes the day after I received these shoes. Very comfortable and my feet stayed dry. I did treat them with Nikwax Waterproofing Wax for Leather as well. You can not go wrong with a pair of Ecco's for golf.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Not sure my game is better but at least the walk is...

customer_reviews.title: Ecco golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for his birthday and he is so pleased with how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe and seems to be well built with quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe and seems to be well built with quality products. Only worn once so time will tell. Certainly no regrets at this point in time.

customer_reviews.title: Ecco makes GREAT golf shoes !
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes - very comfortable- wear well - last well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shea Mulcahy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Five previous pair of same size fit perfectly. This seemed one size larger...and went back
customer_reviews.author: Linkside5

customer_reviews.title: Clydesdale gole
customer_reviews.text: Thanks. These are great golf shoes. I am a clydesdale and need to replace my shoes every 18 months. I play 60 rounds per year and I swear by these shies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Husband plays golf at least 5 + times a week and loves these golf shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought same size as two other athletic type golf shoes, but these seem almost a size too large. Not really waterproof, but maybe resistant might be a better descriptive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable to play in
customer_reviews.text: My feet are slightly larger than a size 12. Most size 12 shoes pinch my feet. The ECCO size 46 fit my feet perfectly. They are very comfortable to play in.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf shoe that could serve as an everyday.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great! They fit much better than the newer version.

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn. 45 years of playing proves it.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, like walking barefooted. Fits me like all my other Ecco shoes have fit.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable golf shoe I have worn. I even bought my twin brother a pair.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best fitting shoe I have ever worn. Extremely comfortable...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband and he really likes them
customer_reviews.author: L M

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but lacking in comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoe but not as comfortable as I was expecting. Seems solid and well made but I was looking for more cushion. Sent them back, Amazon is great for letting you return. Got Sketchers pro instead. These have much better comfort with equal or better stability. I probably like the looks of these slightly better but comfort trumps looks. Also remember comfort is an individual preference so these may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: R. Harlow

customer_reviews.title: They don't look good any longer
customer_reviews.text: The white soles turned yellow. They don't look good any longer.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Best golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I've had Eccos for several years now and they always run about a 1/2 size larger than Nike and adidas golf shoes. Over great shoes and very very comfortable.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would need smaller size next time. Sizing chart led me astray.

customer_reviews.title: Ecco shoes are a step ahead and great walk.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pair of Ecco Golf shoes. The Biom are more comfortable than the EVO. Also I have 6 pair of Ecco dress shoes.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good as they feel great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as they feel great. if they help to knock a few strokes off my game I will be really impressed :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect, look great and comfortable. Second paid in 4 years and would but again.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: style and comfort is perfect but the size is a little big
customer_reviews.author: grace chang

customer_reviews.title: A-OK
customer_reviews.text: Love ECCO's. Always a great shoe that pampers me tired, old feet....
customer_reviews.author: drak53

customer_reviews.title: ... Ecco shoes so I ordered 42 and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 42 in Ecco shoes so I ordered 42 and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the way they look
customer_reviews.text: I like the way they look, feel, and they keep my feet dry. However, I noticed when I walk on the green, they leave indentations. This happend on the putting green the first time. Then the course. The greens were a little soft so then yesterday, I tried it when the grass was dry and in the afternoon and I can still see the imprints. Soft spikes shouldn't have this problem and I hate leaving the green looking like this for the group behind us. Hopefully the spikes will wear down a little and not cause a problem. All the other 6 Ecco shoes I had never had this problem.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best ECCO golf shoe made. I wish they would come back with this style.
customer_reviews.author: E.C. Archer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable golf show I have ever worn! Expensive but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Jordan

customer_reviews.title: How does anyone wear anything else???
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ecco's, second pair of Bioms. The other pair are Evo's. Bioms are nicer than the Evo's for me - leather is softer, has more of a snug fit and overall more comfortable - although my Evo's lasted two seasons, close to 100 rounds, 40% walking and not a sign of wear other than they are dirty. Bottom line is Ecco makes a superior product. These new Bioms out of the box are like slippers but with the necessary support. I don't know that I will ever buy another golf shoe. Not to mention they look great and are very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. I always walk while I golf and this is a good shoe to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Fili T. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: ECCO basically told me too bad the shoes are not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have worn ECCO golf shoes for years but this model causes heel pain. ECCO basically told me too bad the shoes are not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MihuMD

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Biom Hybrid Hydromax Golf Shoe
product_meta.description:
A sporty golf shoe with a smart design offering performance and comfort in all weather conditions. Anatomically shaped insole unit enhances support and flexibility with padded polyester. Water-repellent upper promotes freshness all day long and fights perspiration with over 800 traction angles the innovatively engineered outsole supports balance and swing aiding your performance.

ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
feature_bullets: A sporty lightweight hybrid golf shoe with high performance appeal and snug fit
Hydromax treated leather is superbly weather and perspiration resistant
An extremely strong, lightweight, breathable yak leather upper
BIOM anatomically shaped last for the perfect fit
Ingeniously engineered outsole provides more than 800 traction angles for excellent grip in all weather conditions
